resources.string: Moderate level, you can walk freely in the open sun
Medium level, limit time in the sun
High level, not recommended to go outside
It feels like a real temperature
The wind makes the weather seem cooler
It feels warmer than the actual temperature
Smoke rises vertically. Sea like a mirror
Leaves and small twigs in constant motion; light flags extended
Direction shown by smoke drift but not by wind vanes
Wind felt on face; leaves rustle; wind vane moved by wind
Raises dust and lose paper; small branches moved
Small trees in leaf begin to sway
Large branches in motion; whistling heard in telegraph wires
Twigs break off trees; generally impedes progress
Slight structural damage (chimney pots and slates removed)
Seldom experienced inland; trees uprooted; considerable structural damage
Devastation. Air filled with foam and spray, very poor visibility
It is absolutely clear at the moment
Visibility was slightly reduced due to clouds
Very poor visibility because of the clouds
No precipitation expected for the next 24 hours
In the next 24 hours we expect light precipitation
Average precipitation expected in the next 24 hours
Heavy rainfall expected in the next 24 hours
